jesselarose@Jesses-MacBook-Pro terraform % terraform plan -out=tfplan

╷
│ **Error: Missing resource instance key**
│
│   on api_gateway.tf line 36, in resource "google_api_gateway_api_config" "api_config":
│   36:   api           = google_api_gateway_api.api.api_id
│
│ Because google_api_gateway_api.api has "count" set, its attributes must be
│ accessed on specific instances.
│
│ For example, to correlate with indices of a referring resource, use:
│     google_api_gateway_api.api[count.index]
╵
jesselarose@Jesses-MacBook-Pro terraform %
